title: FinOps transparency
summary: Make cost and scaling visible per integration workload so the platform stays sustainable.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Modernization can increase run cost if scaling and usage are opaque.
whenToUse: Leaders need cost control and chargeback/showback
whenNotToUse: Cost is irrelevant compared to risk and time (rare)

gotchas: Teams optimize cost at the expense of reliability
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Show cost per integration and tie it to throughput and SLOs; optimize with data.

complexity.rationale: Requires tagging discipline and good dashboards.
complexity.skillDemand: Cloud cost management and platform governance skill.
complexity.operationalDemand: Moderateâ€”impacts scaling choices and operational policies.

realWorldExample.approach: Introduced tagging and cost dashboards for integration workloads.
realWorldExample.outcome: More predictable spend and better scaling decisions.
